00022 void IntImage::Clear(void)
00023 {
00024         if(data == NULL)
00025                 ASSERT(buf == NULL);
00026         else
00027         {
00028                 ASSERT(buf != NULL);
00029                 for(int i=0;i<height;i++)       data[i] = NULL;
00030                 delete[] data;  data = NULL;
00031                 delete[] buf;   buf = NULL;
00032                 height = width = 0;
00033                 variance = 0.0;
00034                 label = -1;
00035         }
00036 }

00038 void IntImage::Copy(const IntImage& source)
00039 // the ONLY way to make a copy of 'source' to this image
00040 {
00041         ASSERT(source.height > 0);
00042         ASSERT(source.width > 0);
00043         if(&source == this)     return;
00044         SetSize(CSize(source.height,source.width));
00045         memcpy(buf,source.buf,sizeof(REAL)*height*width);
00046 }
00047 
00048 void IntImage::Load(const CString& filename)
00049 {
00050         IplImage* img;
00051 
00052         img = cvLoadImage(filename,0);
00053         SetSize(CSize(img->height,img->width));
00054         for(int i=0,ih=img->height,iw=img->width;i<ih;i++)
00055         {
00056                 REAL* pdata = data[i];
00057                 unsigned char* pimg = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char*>(img->imageData+img->widthStep*i);
00058                 for(int j=0;j<iw;j++) pdata[j] = pimg[j];
00059         }
00060         cvReleaseImage(&img);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void IntImage::Save(const CString& filename) const
00064 {
00065         IplImage* img;
00066 
00067         img = cvCreateImage(cvSize(width,height),IPL_DEPTH_8U,1);
00068         for(int i=0,ih=img->height,iw=img->width;i<ih;i++)
00069         {
00070                 REAL* pdata = data[i];
00071                 unsigned char* pimg = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char*>(img->imageData+img->widthStep*i);
00072                 for(int j=0;j<iw;j++) pimg[j] = (unsigned char)pdata[j];
00073         }
00074         cvSaveImage(filename,img);
00075         cvReleaseImage(&img);   
00076 }
00077 
00078 void IntImage::SetSize(const CSize size)
00079 // 'size' is the new size of the image, if necessary, memory is reallocated
00080 // size.cx is the new height and size.cy is the new width
00081 {
00082         if((size.cx == height) && (size.cy == width) && (buf != NULL) && (data != NULL) ) return; 
00083         ASSERT(size.cx >= 0); ASSERT(size.cy >= 0);
00084         Clear();
00085 
00086         height = size.cx;       
00087         width = size.cy;
00088 
00089         buf = new REAL[height*width]; ASSERT(buf != NULL);
00090         data = new REAL*[height];       ASSERT(data != NULL);
00091         for(int i=0;i<height;i++)       data[i] = &buf[i*width];
00092 }
00093 
00094 IntImage& IntImage::operator=(const IntImage& source)
00095 {
00096         SetSize(CSize(source.height,source.width));
00097         memcpy(buf,source.buf,sizeof(*buf)*height*width);
00098         label = source.label;
00099         variance = source.variance;
00100 
00101         return *this;
00102 }
00103 
00104 void IntImage::Resize(IntImage &result, REAL ratio) const
00105 {
00106         result.SetSize(CSize(int(height*ratio),int(width*ratio)));
00107         ratio = 1/ratio;
00108         for(int i=0,rh=result.height,rw=result.width;i<rh;i++)
00109                 for(int j=0;j<rw;j++) {
00110                         int x0,y0;
00111                         REAL x,y,fx0,fx1;
00112                         x = j*ratio; y = i*ratio;
00113                         x0 = (int)(x);
00114                         y0 = (int)(y);
00115 
00116                         //by Jianxin Wu  
00117                         //1. The conversion of float to int in C is towards to 0 point, i.e. the floor function for positive numbers, and ceiling function for negative numbers.
00118                         //2. We only make use of ratio<1 in this applicaiton, and all numbers involved are positive.
00119                         //Using these, we have 0<=x<=height-1 and 0<=y<=width-1. Thus, boundary conditions check is not necessary.
00120                         //In languages other than C/C++ or ratio>=1, take care. 
00121                         if (x0 == width-1) x0--;
00122                         if (y0 == height-1) y0--;
00123 
00124                         x = x - x0; y = y - y0;
00125 
00126                         fx0 = data[y0][x0] + x*(data[y0][x0+1]-data[y0][x0]);
00127                         fx1 = data[y0+1][x0] + x*(data[y0+1][x0+1]-data[y0+1][x0]);
00128 
00129                         result.data[i][j] = fx0 + y*(fx1-fx0);
00130                 }
00131 }
00132 
00133 void IntImage::CalculateVarianceAndIntegralImageInPlace(void)
00134 // We pad a zero column and a zero row, so 24*24 image will be 25*25 in size
00135 {
00136         REAL partialsum;
00137         REAL ex,ex2;
00138         REAL size,var;
00139 
00140         ex = 0;
00141         ex2 = 0;
00142         for(int i=0,size=height*width;i<size;i++)
00143         {
00144                 ex += buf[i];
00145                 ex2 += (buf[i]*buf[i]);
00146         }
00147         size = REAL(height*width);
00148         var = ex2/size - (ex/size)*(ex/size);
00149         ASSERT(var >= 0);
00150         if(var>0)
00151                 variance = sqrt(var);
00152         else
00153                 variance = 1.0;
00154 
00155 
00156         for(int i=1;i<width;i++)
00157         {
00158                 data[0][i] = data[0][i-1] + data[0][i];
00159         }
00160         for(int i=1;i<height;i++)
00161         {
00162                 partialsum = 0;
00163                 for(int j=0;j<width;j++)
00164                 {
00165                         partialsum += data[i][j];
00166                         data[i][j] = data[i-1][j] + partialsum;
00167                 }
00168         }
00169 }
00170 
00171 void IntImage::CalcSquareAndIntegral(IntImage& square, IntImage& image) const
00172 {
00173         REAL partialsum,partialsum2;
00174 
00175         square.SetSize(CSize(height+1,width+1));
00176         image.SetSize(CSize(height+1,width+1));
00177 
00178         for(int i=0;i<=width+1;i++) square.buf[i]=image.buf[i]=0;
00179         for(int i=1;i<=height;i++)
00180         {
00181                 partialsum = partialsum2 = 0;
00182                 square.data[i][0] = 0;
00183                 image.data[i][0] = 0;
00184                 for(int j=1;j<=width;j++)
00185                 {
00186                         partialsum += (data[i-1][j-1]*data[i-1][j-1]);
00187                         partialsum2 += data[i-1][j-1];
00188                         square.data[i][j] = square.data[i-1][j] + partialsum;
00189                         image.data[i][j] = image.data[i-1][j] + partialsum2;
00190                 }
00191         }
00192 }

00194 void SwapIntImage(IntImage& i1,IntImage& i2)
00195 {
00196         std::swap(i1.height,i2.height);
00197         std::swap(i1.width,i2.width);
00198         std::swap(i1.buf,i2.buf);
00199         std::swap(i1.data,i2.data);
00200         std::swap(i1.variance,i2.variance);
00201         std::swap(i1.label,i2.label);
00202 }
